# Sizing (MagWpnSpcAb)
## Overview
The wielder of a *sizing* weapon can change the weaponâ€™s size category to any other size category as a standard action. Spellcasters who frequently polymorph themselves appreciate weapons with the sizing special ability.

Moderate transmutation; CL 9th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Enlarge Person (Spell)|enlarge person]]**,* *[[Reduce Person (Spell)|reduce person]]*; Price +1 bonus.

**Source:** Complete Adventurer (WotC), pg. 172
